channel.title: AbstractPK (The Revolution)
channel.description:
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/Abstract.png[/img]
Well. This is my very first Project Insanity server ever. I feel it is worth making it into something bigger. It has it's bugs but that's what I (and soon to be the others) am here for. I have been working on servers for 2 or so years now and it is time I expand on to some real coding. ---------------------------------------------------------------- For everyone wondering, here is proof from [J]ava himself saying I can use the name, AbstractPK: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/rights.png[/img] ---------------------------------------------------------------- [Video coming soon] ---------------------------------------------------------------- Our team will be using Skype, MSN messenger, teamviewer, and Dropbox. We will need prime communication to work on this server if we are going to get anywhere. I sadly have school so that will cut the communications to a limit. ---------------------------------------------------------------- Features: Custom yell 99% money pouch. Full primal armor Working donor status Clan chat Resting (when click on a guy) Other features (to be announced.) ---------------------------------------------------------------- Soon to come: Customization for yell titles for donors only. 100% Rest anywhere (with upped run recharge formula) 100% skills 100% PVP (skulling, and attack level limit (can only attack between x levels)) Better game frames (theres a couple bugs in 2 of them) 100% spells. Improved Dungeoneering. ---------------------------------------------------------------- Apply here: [Code] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want?: How long have you coded?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: [/code] Available Positions: Server Coder, Client Coder, Forum Coder, Advertiser, Testers, Suggester (not really a position but is needed) ---------------------------------------------------------------- Advertisers: 0/2 [code] Person 1 Person 2 [/code] Server Coder: 2/3 [code] Sk8rdude461 (me) Dundermuffin Person 3 [/code] Client Coder: 1/4 [code] Sk8rdude461 Person 2 Person 3 Person 4 [/code] Suggesters: 0/2 [code] Person 1 Person 2 [/code] Testers: 0/4 [code] Person 1 Person 2 Person 3 Person 4 [/code] Forums Coder: 1/3 [code] Sk8rdude461 (me) Person 2 Person 3 [/code] Sk8rdude

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote="[J"]ava link=topic=530675.msg3878113#msg3878113 date=1325805820]
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Bamf (For both)
How old are you?: 18
E-mail address?: mongoose_bmx@hotmail.co.uk
What position do you want?: Client Coder
How long have you coded?: 2-3 years.
What time zone are you in?: UK.
How long will you be on everyday?: Uhh, whenever I’m not out riding or with my girlfriend.
Why do you want to become part of this server?: Slowly developing v2 and I need more client experience.
Any Suggestions?: None at the moment.[/quote]
Java my friend. We need to fix the client before this continues… The auto cache downloader broke.

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:20, topic:427982”]In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Acrodox/Dunder Mifflin
How old are you?: 15
E-mail address?: acrodox@yahoo.com
What position do you want?: Server coder Programmer and Tester
How long have you coded Programmed?: about a solid 1 year
What time zone are you in?: Pacific standard
How long will you be on everyday?: a few hours
Why do you want to become part of this server?: I see that it can go far. And am currently shutting down the once I previously worked on and need something to improve my skills with and keep me busy.
Any Suggestions?: none, previous work I did is here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,499988.msg3656671.html#msg3656671

Im also pretty decent with php and very familiar with SMF.

Cheers. :)[/quote]

If I can get the client working we’ll talk

Anyways, sorry for leaving this thread so… Empty…
I’ve been stuck on another project that is now on a vps and so on.
If anyone would like to help with that please feel free to ask.
The kid paying for all of it wants a fuck load done and I’m only one man.

Read full topic

item.title: AbstractPK (The Revolution)
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("gamble")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 2) { int Gold = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int Gamble = Misc.random(100); if ((Gold <= 1073741823) && (Gold >= 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,Gold) && Gamble > 54) { c.getItems().addItem(995, Gold); c.sendMessage(""+Gamble+", You have won "+Gold+" coins!"); } else if ((Gold <= 1073741823) && (Gold >= 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,Gold) && Gamble < 55) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, Gold); c.sendMessage(""+Gamble+", You have lost "+Gold+" coins."); } else if(Gold == 0) { c.sendMessage("You have to gamble something."); } else if(Gold > 1073741823) { c.sendMessage("You cannot gamble over 1,073,741,823 coins."); } else if ((Gold <= 1073741823) && (Gold >= 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,Gold)==false) { c.sendMessage("You do not have "+Gold+" coins to gamble."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage ::gamble 1m); } } catch(Exception e) { }
There is a tiny anti-leech on there right now though.

Read full topic

item.title: AbstractPK (The Revolution)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well. This is my very first Project Insanity server ever. I feel it is worth making it into something bigger. It has it’s bugs but that’s what I (and soon to be the others) am here for. I have been working on servers for 2 or so years now and it is time I expand on to some real coding.

For everyone wondering, here is proof from [J]ava himself saying I can use the name, AbstractPK:

[Video coming soon]

Our team will be using Skype, MSN messenger, teamviewer, and Dropbox. We will need prime communication to work on this server if we are going to get anywhere. I sadly have school so that will cut the communications to a limit.

Features:
Custom yell
99% money pouch.
Full primal armor
Working donor status
Clan chat
Resting (when click on a guy)
Other features (to be announced.)

Soon to come:
Customization for yell titles for donors only.
100% Rest anywhere (with upped run recharge formula)
100% skills
100% PVP (skulling, and attack level limit (can only attack between x levels))
Better game frames (theres a couple bugs in 2 of them)
100% spells.
Improved Dungeoneering.

Apply here:

How old are you?:
E-mail address?:

How long have you coded?:
What time zone are you in?:
